title: WaPo = Forced Birth Ally? Subway “Tuna” = Tuna and Other Stuff? 07.19.22
itunes:title: WaPo = Forced Birth Ally? Subway “Tuna” = Tuna and Other Stuff? 07.19.22
description:
In episode 1290, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian, actor, writer and host of Senior Superlatives, Greta Titelman, to discuss… This Politico Article Demonstrates The Horrifying Way The MSM Has Responded to Roe Being Overturned, Subway TunaGate: It’s def tuna, but def some other things too..., Major League Baseball Has a Vaccine Problem and more!

  1. This Politico Article Demonstrates The Horrifying Way The MSM Has Responded to Roe Being Overturned
  2. Subway TunaGate: It’s def tuna, but def some other things too...
  3. Major League Baseball Has a Vaccine Problem
  4. Unvaccinated M.L.B. players will not be allowed to play in Canada.
  5. American-born players represent 94% of MLB's unvaccinated barred from Canada due to COVID mandate
  6. Every Toronto Blue Jays home series reveals more problems with MLB’s weak Covid policy

LISTEN: Summer Madness S.A. by Karriem Riggins

Check Out: Clown Parade Podcast

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
